type.title: Folder Creator Type
type.description:
select folder creaton PathType.
Type lowElectron: get path from app.getPath() then add {appFolderName} to it.
Type rawPath: get path from app.getPath() without any change.
Type customName: get path from app.getPath() then add your "customName" property to it.
Default is "lowElectron"

customName.title: Custom Folder Name
customName.description:
write your own custom folder name.
*use this property if you set "type" to "customName"*
customName.markdownDescription:
write your own custom folder name.

**Use this property if you set `"type"` to `"customName"`**

appIcons.description: App Icons Path, Sorted by Icon Usage

appTitlebar.description: a PNG/JPG/WebP/GIF 32x32 image for in app Titlebar Icon.
appTitlebar.markdownDescription: a `PNG/JPG/WebP/GIF` 32x32 image for in app Titlebar Icon.

appFile.description:
an Icon image to be used as app execution file Icon.
type of Icon is depends on your platform (windows, linux, mac).
appFile.markdownDescription:
an Icon image to be used as app execution file Icon.

type of Icon is depends on your platform (`windows`, `linux`, `mac`).

taskbar.description:
an Icon image to be used as app taskbar, etc... Icon.
allowed formats: PNG/JPG + on Windows it Support ICO.
you can leave it undefined so executable's Icon will be used!
taskbar.markdownDescription:
an Icon image to be used as **app taskbar, etc...** Icon.

allowed formats: `PNG/JPG` + on Windows it Support `ICO`.

**you can leave it undefined so executable's Icon will be used!**

CustomPaths.title: Custom Paths
CustomPaths.description: You can add Absolute Paths so they Will be in BE.Path and they will be created when app is loading.
CustomPaths.markdownDescription: You can add **Absolute Paths** so they Will be in **`BE.Path`** and they will be created when app is loading.

path.title: The Path
path.description:
write your own path
Replaces: {app} => return application path, {dirName} => same as __dirname, Any of available values in app.getPath() (ex. {downloads} ).
Example: "C:/Users/UserName/Documents/my-custom-folder".
path.markdownDescription:
write your own path

**Replaces**: `{app}` => return application path, `{dirName}` => same as `__dirname`, Any of available values in `app.getPath()` (ex. `{downloads}`).

**Example 1**: `"C:/Users/UserName/Documents/my-custom-folder"`.

**Example 2**: `"{documents}/my-custom-folder"`.

ignoreLevel.title: Ignore Level
ignoreLevel.description:
set how important is this path creation.
Level high: it will stop user from using app an it will show an error to user.
Level medium: it will only show user an error and user can still use app
Level low: it won't show any error to user and user still can use the app, its value in BE.Path will be null.

onError.description: set what to do when we have error on creating this path.

type.description:
choose type of value Property.
Type text: the value property gonna be a message to user onError.
Type lang: the value property gonna be name of the language manager property.
Type function: the value property should be name of a function that will be execute onError with 1 arg whitch is error massage.
type.markdownDescription:
choose type of value Property.

Type `text`: the value property gonna be a message to user **onError**.

Type `lang`: the value property gonna be name of the language manager property.

Type `function`: the value property should be name of a function that will be execute **onError** with **1** arg whitch is error massage.

value.description:
set onError event action.
The value is fully depends on type property!
value.markdownDescription:
set **onError** event action.

The `value` is **fully depends** on `type` property!

settingPath.description:
write where the settings file should be saved.
it should be name of AppPaths or CustomPaths.
Default is: documents
settingPath.markdownDescription:
write where the settings file should be saved.

It should be name of `AppPaths` or `CustomPaths`.

Default is: `documents`
